title: what is the update at dak america as of dec. 1, 2013? thanks, am
text:
As far as we know, that plant is closed.

We published this timeline when they announced it:

http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20130921/ARTICLES/130929943/0/search

Since then we've referred in numerous stories to the closure of the
DAK plant, and no one has ever called to tell us it's still
operating.
